name: The Legend of Heroes A Tear of Vermillion
name_original: The Legend of Heroes A Tear of Vermillion
description:
The Legend of Heroes A Tear of Vermillion is a RPG game developed by Nihon Falcom. It came out on 24-05-1996. NIHON FALCOM published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play The Legend of Heroes A Tear of Vermillion on PSP, PlayStation and PC.
